name: The Spirit Project
description:
Controls:

  • Left-Mouse Button: Drop Torch
  • WASD (Forward, Left, Backwards, Right)

Welcome to the Island of Teia! You are a descendant of the Kahuna, a family of Spirit Guides. For generations your family has helped find and guide the Uhane, or lost spirits, to the Great Heavens.

Find and guide the Uhane to freedom. Use your torches to light a path and make the Uhane chase you to the Bridge of the Heavens. Watch out! Don’t get caught in the dark!
